edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.defecttracker.search.controllers

Class RetrieveAllDefectsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.defecttracker.search.controllers.RetrieveAllDefectsController

  • public class RetrieveAllDefectsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller to handle retrieving all defects from the server and displaying them in the SearchDefectsView

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Defect[] data
      The defects data retrieved from the server

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorReceivingData(java.lang.String error)

      This method is called by the RetrieveAllDefectsRequestObserver when the response is received

      Sends a request for all of the defects
